00009 /* for dgCMatrix  _and_ lgCMatrix and others  (but *not*  ngC...) : */
00010 SEXP xCMatrix_validate(SEXP x)
00011 {
00012     /* Almost everything now in Csparse_validate ( ./Csparse.c )
00013      * *but* the checking of the 'x' slot : */
00014     if (length(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym)) !=
00015         length(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)))
00016         return mkString(_("lengths of slots 'i' and 'x' must match"));
00017 
00018     return ScalarLogical(1);
00019 }
00020 
00021 /* for dgRMatrix  _and_ lgRMatrix and others  (but *not*  ngC...) : */
00022 SEXP xRMatrix_validate(SEXP x)
00023 {
00024     /* Almost everything now in Rsparse_validate ( ./Csparse.c )
00025      * *but* the checking of the 'x' slot : */
00026     if (length(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym)) !=
00027         length(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)))
00028         return mkString(_("lengths of slots 'j' and 'x' must match"));
00029 
00030     return ScalarLogical(1);
00031 }

00033 /* This and the following R_to_CMatrix() lead to memory-not-mapped seg.faults
00034  * only with {32bit + R-devel + enable-R-shlib} -- no idea why */
00035 SEXP compressed_to_TMatrix(SEXP x, SEXP colP)
00036 {
00037     int col = asLogical(colP); /* 1 if "C"olumn compressed;  0 if "R"ow */
00038     /* however, for Csparse, we now effectively use the cholmod-based
00039      * Csparse_to_Tsparse() in ./Csparse.c ; maybe should simply write
00040      * an  as_cholmod_Rsparse() function and then do "as there" ...*/
00041     SEXP indSym = col ? Matrix_iSym : Matrix_jSym,
00042         ans,    indP = GET_SLOT(x, indSym),
00043         pP = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym);
00044     int npt = length(pP) - 1;
00045     char *ncl = strdup(class_P(x));
00046     char *valid[] = {
00047         "dgCMatrix", "dsCMatrix", "dtCMatrix", /* 0: 0:2 */
00048         "lgCMatrix", "lsCMatrix", "ltCMatrix", /* 1: 3:5 */
00049         "ngCMatrix", "nsCMatrix", "ntCMatrix", /* 2: 6:8 */
00050         "zgCMatrix", "zsCMatrix", "ztCMatrix", /* 3: 9:11 */
00051 
00052         "dgRMatrix", "dsRMatrix", "dtRMatrix", /* 4: 12:14 */
00053         "lgRMatrix", "lsRMatrix", "ltRMatrix", /* 5: 15:17 */
00054         "ngRMatrix", "nsRMatrix", "ntRMatrix", /* 6: 18:20 */
00055         "zgRMatrix", "zsRMatrix", "ztRMatrix", /* 7: 21:23 */
00056         ""};
00057     int ctype = Matrix_check_class(ncl, valid);
00058 
00059     if (ctype < 0)
00060         error(_("invalid class(x) '%s' in compressed_to_TMatrix(x)"), ncl);
00061 
00062     /* replace 'C' or 'R' with 'T' :*/
00063     ncl[2] = 'T';
00064     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(ncl)));
00065 
00066     slot_dup(ans, x, Matrix_DimSym);
00067     if((ctype / 3) % 4 != 2) /* not n..Matrix */
00068         slot_dup(ans, x, Matrix_xSym);
00069     if(ctype % 3) { /* s(ymmetric) or t(riangular) : */
00070         slot_dup(ans, x, Matrix_uploSym);
00071         if(ctype % 3 == 2) /* t(riangular) : */
00072             slot_dup(ans, x, Matrix_diagSym);
00073     }
00074     SET_DimNames(ans, x);
00075     SET_SLOT(ans, indSym, duplicate(indP));
00076     expand_cmprPt(npt, INTEGER(pP),
00077                   INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, col ? Matrix_jSym : Matrix_iSym,
00078                                      INTSXP, length(indP))));
00079     free(ncl);
00080     UNPROTECT(1);
00081     return ans;
00082 }
00083 
00084 SEXP R_to_CMatrix(SEXP x)
00085 {
00086     SEXP ans, tri = PROTECT(allocVector(LGLSXP, 1));
00087     char *ncl = strdup(class_P(x));
00088     char *valid[] = {
00089         "dgRMatrix", "dsRMatrix", "dtRMatrix",
00090         "lgRMatrix", "lsRMatrix", "ltRMatrix",
00091         "ngRMatrix", "nsRMatrix", "ntRMatrix",
00092         "zgRMatrix", "zsRMatrix", "ztRMatrix",
00093         ""};
00094     int ctype = Matrix_check_class(ncl, valid);
00095     int *x_dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)), *a_dims;
00096 
00097     if (ctype < 0)
00098         error(_("invalid class(x) '%s' in R_to_CMatrix(x)"), ncl);
00099 
00100     /* replace 'R' with 'C' : */
00101     ncl[2] = 'C';
00102     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(ncl)));
00103 
00104     a_dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00105     /* reversed dim() since we will transpose: */
00106     a_dims[0] = x_dims[1];
00107     a_dims[1] = x_dims[0];
00108 
00109     /* triangular: */ LOGICAL(tri)[0] = 0;
00110     if((ctype / 3) != 2) /* not n..Matrix */
00111         slot_dup(ans, x, Matrix_xSym);
00112     if(ctype % 3) { /* s(ymmetric) or t(riangular) : */
00113         SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_uploSym,
00114                  mkString((*uplo_P(x) == 'U') ? "L" : "U"));
00115         if(ctype % 3 == 2) { /* t(riangular) : */
00116             LOGICAL(tri)[0] = 1;
00117             slot_dup(ans, x, Matrix_diagSym);
00118         }
00119     }
00120     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym)));
00121     slot_dup(ans, x, Matrix_pSym);
00122     ans = Csparse_transpose(ans, tri);
00123     SET_DimNames(ans, x);
00124     free(ncl);
00125     UNPROTECT(2);
00126     return ans;
00127 }
00128 
00129 SEXP compressed_non_0_ij(SEXP x, SEXP colP)
00130 {
00131     int col = asLogical(colP); /* 1 if "C"olumn compressed;  0 if "R"ow */
00132     SEXP ans, indSym = col ? Matrix_iSym : Matrix_jSym;
00133     SEXP indP = GET_SLOT(x, indSym),
00134         pP = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym);
00135     int n_el = length(indP), i, *ij;
00136 
00137     ij = INTEGER(ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(INTSXP, n_el, 2)));
00138     /* expand the compressed margin to 'i' or 'j' : */
00139     expand_cmprPt(length(pP) - 1, INTEGER(pP), &ij[col ? n_el : 0]);
00140     /* and copy the other one: */
00141     if (col)
00142         for(i = 0; i < n_el; i++)
00143             ij[i] = INTEGER(indP)[i];
00144     else /* row compressed */
00145         for(i = 0; i < n_el; i++)
00146             ij[i + n_el] = INTEGER(indP)[i];
00147 
00148     UNPROTECT(1);
00149     return ans;
00150 }

00152 SEXP dgCMatrix_lusol(SEXP x, SEXP y)
00153 {
00154     SEXP ycp = PROTECT(duplicate(y));
00155     CSP xc = AS_CSP(x);
00156     R_CheckStack();
00157 
00158     if (xc->m != xc->n || xc->m <= 0)
00159         error(_("dgCMatrix_lusol requires a square, non-empty matrix"));
00160     if (!isReal(ycp) || LENGTH(ycp) != xc->m)
00161         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00162     if (!cs_lusol(/*order*/ 1, xc, REAL(ycp), /*tol*/ 1e-7))
00163         error(_("cs_lusol failed"));
00164 
00165     UNPROTECT(1);
00166     return ycp;
00167 }
00168 
00169 SEXP dgCMatrix_qrsol(SEXP x, SEXP y)
00170 {
00171     SEXP ycp = PROTECT(duplicate(y));
00172     CSP xc = AS_CSP(x);
00173     R_CheckStack();
00174 
00175     if (xc->m < xc->n || xc->n <= 0)
00176         error(_("dgCMatrix_qrsol requires a 'tall' rectangular matrix"));
00177     if (!isReal(ycp) || LENGTH(ycp) != xc->m)
00178         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00179     if (!cs_qrsol(/*order*/ 1, xc, REAL(ycp)))
00180         error(_("cs_qrsol failed"));
00181 
00182     UNPROTECT(1);
00183     return ycp;
00184 }
00185 
00186 /* Modified version of Tim Davis's cs_qr_mex.c file for MATLAB */
00187 SEXP dgCMatrix_QR(SEXP Ap, SEXP order)
00188 {
00189     SEXP ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("sparseQR")));
00190     CSP A = AS_CSP(Ap), D;
00191     css *S;
00192     csn *N;
00193     int m = A->m, n = A->n, ord = asLogical(order) ? 3 : 0, *p;
00194     R_CheckStack();
00195 
00196     if (m < n) error("A must have # rows >= # columns") ;
00197     S = cs_sqr(ord, A, 1);      /* symbolic QR ordering & analysis*/
00198     if (!S) error("cs_sqr failed");
00199     N = cs_qr(A, S);            /* numeric QR factorization */
00200     if (!N) error("cs_qr failed") ;
00201     cs_dropzeros(N->L);         /* drop zeros from V and sort */
00202     D = cs_transpose(N->L, 1);
00203     cs_spfree(N->L);
00204     N->L = cs_transpose(D, 1);
00205     cs_spfree(D);
00206     cs_dropzeros(N->U);         /* drop zeros from R and sort */
00207     D = cs_transpose(N->U, 1);
00208     cs_spfree(N->U) ;
00209     N->U = cs_transpose(D, 1);
00210     cs_spfree(D);
00211     m = N->L->m;                /* m may be larger now */
00212     p = cs_pinv(S->pinv, m);    /* p = pinv' */
00213     SET_SLOT(ans, install("V"),
00214              Matrix_cs_to_SEXP(N->L, "dgCMatrix", 0));
00215     Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("beta"),
00216                            REALSXP, n)), N->B, n);
00217     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym,
00218                               INTSXP, m)), p, m);
00219     SET_SLOT(ans, install("R"),
00220              Matrix_cs_to_SEXP(N->U, "dgCMatrix", 0));
00221     if (ord)
00222         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("q"),
00223                                   INTSXP, n)), S->q, n);
00224     else
00225         ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("q"), INTSXP, 0);
00226     cs_nfree(N);
00227     cs_sfree(S);
00228     cs_free(p);
00229     UNPROTECT(1);
00230     return ans;
00231 }
00232 
00233 /* Modified version of Tim Davis's cs_lu_mex.c file for MATLAB */
00234 SEXP dgCMatrix_LU(SEXP Ap, SEXP orderp, SEXP tolp)
00235 {
00236     SEXP ans = get_factors(Ap, "LU");
00237     CSP A = AS_CSP(Ap), D;
00238     css *S;
00239     csn *N;
00240     int n, order = asInteger(orderp), *p;
00241     double tol = asReal(tolp);
00242     R_CheckStack();
00243 
00244     /* FIXME: dgCMatrix_LU should check ans for consistency in
00245      * permutation type with the requested value - Should have two
00246      * classes or two different names in the factors list for LU with
00247      * permuted columns or not. */
00248 
00249     if (ans != R_NilValue) return ans;
00250     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("sparseLU")));
00251     n = A->n;
00252     if (A->m != n)
00253         error("LU decomposition applies only to square matrices");
00254     if (order) {                /* not using natural order */
00255         order = (tol == 1) ? 2  /* amd(S'*S) w/dense rows or I */
00256             : 1;                /* amd (A+A'), or natural */
00257     }
00258     S = cs_sqr (order, A, 0) ;  /* symbolic ordering, no QR bound */
00259     N = cs_lu (A, S, tol) ;     /* numeric factorization */
00260     if (!N) error ("cs_lu failed (singular, or out of memory)") ;
00261     cs_dropzeros (N->L) ;       /* drop zeros from L and sort it */
00262     D = cs_transpose (N->L, 1) ;
00263     cs_spfree (N->L) ;
00264     N->L = cs_transpose (D, 1) ;
00265     cs_spfree (D) ;
00266     cs_dropzeros (N->U) ;       /* drop zeros from U and sort it */
00267     D = cs_transpose (N->U, 1) ;
00268     cs_spfree (N->U) ;
00269     N->U = cs_transpose (D, 1) ;
00270     cs_spfree (D) ;
00271     p = cs_pinv (N->pinv, n) ;  /* p=pinv' */
00272     SET_SLOT(ans, install("L"),
00273              Matrix_cs_to_SEXP(N->L, "dgCMatrix", 0));
00274     SET_SLOT(ans, install("U"),
00275              Matrix_cs_to_SEXP(N->U, "dgCMatrix", 0));
00276     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_pSym,
00277                               INTSXP, n)), p, n);
00278     if (order)
00279         Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, install("q"),
00280                                   INTSXP, n)), S->q, n);
00281     cs_nfree(N);
00282     cs_sfree(S);
00283     cs_free(p);
00284     UNPROTECT(1);
00285     return set_factors(Ap, ans, "LU");
00286 }
00287 
00288 SEXP dgCMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP Ap, SEXP b)
00289 {
00290     /* b is dense or NULL [ <--> solve(A) */
00291     SEXP lu = dgCMatrix_LU(Ap, ScalarLogical(1), ScalarReal(1));
00292     SEXP qslot = GET_SLOT(lu, install("q"));
00293     CSP L = AS_CSP(GET_SLOT(lu, install("L"))),
00294         U = AS_CSP(GET_SLOT(lu, install("U")));
00295     SEXP ans = PROTECT( !isNull(b) ? dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b)
00296                         : new_dgeMatrix(U->n, U->n));
00297     int *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym));
00298     int j, n = bdims[0], nrhs = bdims[1];
00299     int *p = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(lu, Matrix_pSym)),
00300         *q = LENGTH(qslot) ? INTEGER(qslot) : (int *) NULL;
00301     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym)),
00302         *x = Alloca(n, double);
00303     R_CheckStack();
00304 
00305     if (U->n != n || nrhs < 1 || n < 1)
00306         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00307     for (j = 0; j < nrhs; j++) {
00308         if(!isNull(b))
00309             cs_pvec(p, ax + j * n, x, n);  /* x = b(p) */
00310         else { /* solve(A): (RHS) B = I_n,  hence  b = e_j (j-th unit vector) */
00311             int i;
00312             for(i=0; i < n; i++) x[i] = (p[i] == j) ? 1. : 0.;
00313         }
00314         cs_lsolve(L, x);               /* x = L\x */
00315         cs_usolve(U, x);               /* x = U\x */
00316         if (q)                         /* b(q) = x */
00317             cs_ipvec(q, x, ax + j * n, n);
00318         else
00319             Memcpy(ax + j * n, x, n);
00320     }
00321     UNPROTECT(1);
00322     return ans;
00323 }
00324 
00325 SEXP dgCMatrix_cholsol(SEXP x, SEXP y)
00326 {
00327     CHM_SP cx = AS_CHM_SP(x);
00328     CHM_FR L;
00329     CHM_DN cy = AS_CHM_DN(y), rhs, cAns;
00330     double one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00331     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 3));
00332     R_CheckStack();
00333 
00334     if (cx->ncol < cx->nrow || cx->ncol <= 0)
00335         error(_("dgCMatrix_cholsol requires a 'short, wide' rectangular matrix"));
00336     if (cy->nrow != cx->ncol)
00337         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00338     rhs = cholmod_allocate_dense(cx->nrow, 1, cx->nrow, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00339     if (!(cholmod_sdmult(cx, 0 /* trans */, one, zero, cy, rhs, &c)))
00340         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error"));
00341     L = cholmod_analyze(cx, &c);
00342     if (!cholmod_factorize(cx, L, &c))
00343         error(_("cholmod_factorize failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00344               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00345 /* FIXME: Do this in stages so an "effects" vector can be calculated */
00346     if (!(cAns = cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_A, L, rhs, &c)))
00347         error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_A) failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00348               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00349     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 0, chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 0));
00350     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1, allocVector(REALSXP, cx->nrow));
00351     Memcpy(REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1)), (double*)(cAns->x), cx->nrow);
00352 /* FIXME: Change this when the "effects" vector is available */
00353     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 2, allocVector(REALSXP, cx->nrow));
00354     Memcpy(REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1)), (double*)(rhs->x), cx->nrow);
00355 
00356     cholmod_free_factor(&L, &c);
00357     cholmod_free_dense(&rhs, &c);
00358     cholmod_free_dense(&cAns, &c);
00359     UNPROTECT(1);
00360     return ans;
00361 }

00391 SEXP lgCMatrix_colSums(SEXP x, SEXP NArm, SEXP spRes, SEXP trans, SEXP means)
00392 {
00393     if(asLogical(means)) /* ==> result will be "double" / "dsparseVector" */
00394         return lgCMatrix_colSums_d(x, NArm, spRes, trans, means);
00395     else
00396         return lgCMatrix_colSums_i(x, NArm, spRes, trans, means);
00397 }
00398 
00399 SEXP ngCMatrix_colSums(SEXP x, SEXP NArm, SEXP spRes, SEXP trans, SEXP means)
00400 {
00401     if(asLogical(means)) /* ==> result will be "double" / "dsparseVector" */
00402         return ngCMatrix_colSums_d(x, NArm, spRes, trans, means);
00403     else
00404         return ngCMatrix_colSums_i(x, NArm, spRes, trans, means);
00405 }
